How can we effectively migrate

We also realized that we cannot work alone,
we need a team within the organization / company

and also provide intensive & continuous support
from experienced parties
The final decision fell on AWS
by considering several criteria
including, completeness of services
compatibility and ease of mapping infrastructure
full technical and non-technical support

In addition to intensive support from AWS,
the most important key to success is the training provided by AWS
We work closely with AWS Training & Certification to equip teams

to specific knowledge related to the migration process
